Muradin.name: Storm Bolt
Muradin.description: Throw a hammer, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and stunning it for 1.25 seconds.

Muradin.name: Thunder Clap
Muradin.description: Deals 96 (+4% per level) damage and slows enemies Movement and Attack Speed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

Muradin.name: Dwarf Toss
Muradin.description: Leap to target location, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies on landing. Upon leaping, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

Muradin.name: Avatar
Muradin.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1124 (+4% per level) Health.

Muradin.name: Haymaker
Muradin.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

Muradin.name: Second Wind
Muradin.description: Restore 51 (+4% per level) Health per second when you have not taken damage for 4 seconds. When below 40% Health, increased to 102 (+4% per level) Health per second.

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Perfect Storm
1.description: Reduces Storm Bolt's Mana cost by 25%. Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.

1.name: Third Wind
1.description: Increases Health Restoration rate to 80 (+4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 159 (+4% per level) per second Restoration.

4.name: Crowd Control
4.description: Each enemy hit by Thunder Clap reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds and restores 5 Mana, to a maximum of 9 targets.

4.name: Reverberation
4.description: Increases the Attack Speed slow from 25% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3 seconds.

4.name: Sledgehammer
4.description: Deals 400% damage to non-Heroic enemies. Destroys 4 ammo from Structures.

4.name: Thunder Burn
4.description: Thunder Clap leaves a zone on the ground that explodes after 2 seconds dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage and applying a 25% slow for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Iron-forged Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Storm Bolt and Thunderclap by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Landing Momentum
7.description: Increases your Movement Speed by 25% for 5 seconds upon landing with Dwarf Toss.

7.name: Piercing Bolt
7.description: Penetrates through the first target hit, hitting 1 additional target.

7.name: Skullcracker
7.description: Increases your Basic Attack Speed by 25%.  Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target will stun them for 0.25 seconds.

10.name: Avatar
10.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Haymaker
10.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Healing Static
13.description: Heal for 5% of your Max Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.name: Thunder Strike
13.description: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.

16.name: Dwarf Launch
16.description: Increases the range and impact radius of Dwarf Toss by 50%.

16.name: Give 'em the Axe!
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 60% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Heavy Impact
16.description: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are stunned for 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds. Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Stoneform
16.description: Activate to heal for 40% of your maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

20.name: Grand Slam
20.description: Damage of Haymaker increased by 25%, Mana cost lowered by 40, and can store 2 charges.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

20.name: Unstoppable Force
20.description: Increases the duration of Avatar by 30%, and the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows are reduced by 75% while in Avatar.
